hero.title: Break down language barriers with Supertext – it’s more than just a simple translator.
hero.description_line1: Communicate faster, better and easier. With Supertext, you can translate content online in the blink of an eye. Become fluent in all national languages – era rumantsch! {br} {br} Thanks to the next-generation of artificial intelligence (AI), you can now simplify your translation process: translate different file formats into other languages in just a single click. Our translation AI is constantly learning. And you can count on continuous development – including new helpful features. {br} {br} No matter if you are a private individual, small company or large organisation, Supertext offers you an innovative translation solution operated on Swiss servers with stringent security standards.

register_section.title: Get even more with Supertext translation’s software
register_section.description: Get more translation power for free: register for our free plan. By doing so, you can actively help to make the Supertext translator even better.

feature_tutorial.title: Take control
feature_tutorial.description: Not quite satisfied with a translation or looking for inspiration?

list.item1: Click on a word to get alternatives.
list.item4: Like or dislike results to help us improve.

features_section.title: Translate easier and faster with Supertext – tailor your communication
features_section.description: Supertext speaks your language: discover more benefits of using Supertext with a Basic or Enterprise plan – for ambitious teams and companies.

details.title: 40–60% increase in efficiency
descriptions: More time for everything AI can’t help with.

details.title: Tailor-made translations
descriptions: Communication that follows your style guide and is based on your data, in more than 20 languages.

details.title: Seamless integration
descriptions: Can be directly integrated into your internal systems (e.g. Microsoft Office, CAT tool) or via the Supertext API

details.title: Maximum control
descriptions: Choose the hosting option that suits you and easily manage it via your Supertext Cockpit

partners_section.title: Diese Unternehmen kommunizieren bereits mehrsprachig – einheitlich und sicher
partners_section.cta_text: Unsere massgeschneiderte Business-Lösung für Ihr Unternehmen

reviews_section.title: Our users are fluent in at least five languages

reviews.text: I love you guys! Your website is a lifesaver – especially for Swiss German translations! I use it every day.
Cool tool, I really like that you can make individual corrections to the translation suggestions.
We’re so lucky to have you!!!
The best translation website when it comes to translating Swiss German into standard German.
The best translation aid that I know of – it’s super helpful.
I think it’s great that Romansh is available.

footer.title: These companies are already multilingual – and all consistent with their style

cookieBanner.textPrefix: We use cookies in order to continually improve our website. By clicking “Accept”, you agree to the use of cookies in accordance with our
cookieBanner.textSuffix: Alternatively, you can specify your preferred settings by clicking “More options”.

modal.title: Cookie settings
modal.descriptionPrefix: You can choose which cookies are set when you use our website by adjusting your preferences. For more information, please see our
modal.necessaryDescription: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be deactivated. Generally, they are only set in response to actions you take that correspond to a service request, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in, or filling out forms. Necessary cookies do not store any personal information.
modal.performanceDescription: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so that we can measure and improve the performance of our website. They help us to see how visitors move around the site and what features they use. Any information they collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you choose not to use them, we will not know when you visited our site and will not be able to monitor its performance.

encryptedTransfer.name: Encrypted transfer
